# metabase_user (Resource)

Metabase User

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "metabase_user" "example" {
  email      = "example@example.fr"
  first_name = "example"
  last_name  = "example"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `email` (String) User email

### Optional

- `first_name` (String) User first name
- `last_name` (String) User last name

### Read-Only

- `id` (Number) User Id
